thread.title: State Gambling Revenue Takes Hit as Millennials Bring New Habits to Casinos
thread.title_full: State Gambling Revenue Takes Hit as Millennials Bring New Habits to Casinos

title: State Gambling Revenue Takes Hit as Millennials Bring New Habits to Casinos
text:
17 State Gambling Revenue Takes Hit as Millennials Bring New Habits to Casinos 
Stateline: Casinos across the nation are suffering from a generation gap, especially at the slot machines, as young people seek more exotic electronic games like the ones they can play on smartphones from anywhere.Thatâ€™s a problem not just for casino operators, but for the 23 states that rely on revenue from casino taxes, particularly from lucrative slots, to help balance their budgets and fund new priorities.
